dmca.title: Killer Copyright Claim?
dmca.body:
Dear KillerMovies.com,

 It has come to our attention that copyrighted content, created by [Private] for Purplemath, has been posted to your servers, in apparent
 violation of your usage terms:

  http://www.killermovies.com/forums/misc.php?action=rules

 We were not able to locate your DMCA "Safe Harbour" page. You are therefore
 being provided with the following information:

 ==============================================
 ==============================================

 1) The following is an electronic copy of the signature of the Purplemath
 copyright owner:

 /[Private]/

 As the copyright owner, [Private] is authorized to speak on the
 behalf of the copyright owner.

 (Copyright Registration Numbers TX 5-725-275, TX 5-804-898, TX 5-956-884,
 and TX 6-381-282; statutory damages may apply)

 ( http://www.purplemath.com/terms.htm )

 ==============================================

 2) The identity of the copyrighted materials infringed:

 http://www.purplemath.com/modules/solverad.htm

 ==============================================

 3) The identity of the material claimed to be an infringement:

 http://www.killermovies.com/forums/showthread.php?s=&postid=7343046&highlight=forumid%3A61+userid%3A68913#post7343046

 ==============================================

 4) Information reasonably sufficient to allow the online service provider
 to contact the complaining party:

[Private]
 Palatine IL 60074-5548

 Purplemath.com
 [Private]
 P.O. Box 1184
 Palatine IL 60078-1184

 [Private]

 [Private]l@purplemath.com

 ==============================================

 5) Statement that the complaining party has "a good faith belief that use
 of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
 copyright owner, its agent or the law."

 "I, [Private], creator and owner of the lessons content and images
 on all the pages listed at:

 http://www.purplemath.com/

 ...have never given permission to user "Barker", the KillerMovies forums,
 KillerMovies.com, their staff, their vendors, or any other of their agents
 or affiliates to copy, mirror, download/upload, frame, hotlink, rework, or
 otherwise present my work, or derivatives thereof, as his/her/their own.

 "I, [Private], hereby reiterate my good faith belief that use of the
 material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
 owner, its agent or the law."

 ==============================================

 6) Statement that the information in the notice is accurate, and under
 penalty of perjury, that the complaining party is authorized to act on
 behalf of the
 copyright owner.

 "To the best of my knowledge, the information I, [Private], have
 hereby presented is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the
 complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner."

 ==============================================
 ==============================================

 If you need the above to be directed to any additional addresses, or if you
 need any further documentation, or to have the above documentation
 reformatted, or in some other way refashioned, please provide specific
 instructions.

 Thank you for your assistance in this matter.

 Sincerely,

 [Private}
 Purplemath - Your Algebra Resource
 http://www.purplemath.com/
